short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Deze extensie helpt nieuwsartikelen te analyseren op inhoudelijke kenmerken die vaak geassocieerd worden met desinformatie.
short.en: This extension allows you to analyse news articles for content features often associated with misinformation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The aim of this project is to give an unbiased indication of misleading content. 
The user is required to provide their own ChatGPT API key. 
A limited set of news sources is supported, visit https://wild-merrill-no-name-org-420b310d.koyeb.app/ for more information.
